name: onenote-add-in-rubric-grader
title: Rubric grader task pane add-in for OneNote on the web
shortDescription: A OneNote add-in that helps teachers grade writing assignments based on a grading rubric.
longDescription: The Rubric Grader sample shows you how to use the OneNote JavaScript API in a OneNote task pane add-in. The add-in gets page content, adds an outline to the page, and opens a different page. It helps teachers grade writing assignments based on a grading rubric and provides a standard template for adding feedback.

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of the Rubric Grader task pane add-in running in OneNote Online showing the grading interface.

references.name: OneNote JavaScript API overview
references.description: Learn about the OneNote JavaScript API and how to use it to build OneNote add-ins.

references.name: Office Add-ins platform overview
references.description: You can use the Office Add-ins platform to build solutions that extend Office applications and interact with content in Office documents.
